last_episode_to_air.name: Part 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Grab your butter-beer and broomsticks, it's time for Part 3 (of 3) of Mikey's look back across the Harry Potter movie franchise!

name: The Story of Harry Potter
overview: This documentary series reviews the stories and decisions being made behind the scenes. How time and again what could have exploded into a fiery ball of donkey-sauce resulted in one of the most beloved, and successful, film franchises in movie history.
